name: Microsoft Office User Settings File
summary: Learn about .OPAL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: OCT allows users to customize the default settings that will be in Microsoft Office when it is installed. Examples of default settings would be default font size, autocorrect options, or file validation options.
OPAL files are used along with the language neutral .OPAX to create the custom installation in the form of an .MSP file.
